archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.1.5e: e) there is an increase in the frequency and impact of serious cyber attacks in the industry sector in which the organisation operates (e.g. based on findings from security event management and threat intelligence).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
